    • Handling large datasets with arrow

Package index

Cache

Functions for handling locally stored data

mr_cache_dir()
Check the location of the cache

Downloading data

Functions that download data

mr_download_17lands_file()
Download a 17lands data file

Getting data into R

Functions that fetch and load data into R

mr_get_17lands_data()
Get 17lands data
mr_get_17lands_cols()
Get column names of a 17lands data file
mr_get_sets()
Get a list of Magic the Gathering sets

Arrow

Functions that facilitate working with the {arrow} package for out-of-memory data

mr_make_17lands_schema()
Create an arrow schema for 17lands data
mr_open_17lands_arrow()
Open a dataset in arrow format

Datasets

Datasets included with this package, mostly metadata

replay_cols
Column names and types in replay data
